title: Thoughts and Reflections - Volume I
description: Is Everyone Unique? Do your experiences shape who you are, or how you live?Inside this book you will experience what happens when you allow your thoughts, feelings, dreams and experiences to control the art of writing. Written by author Leonard Belmont, these writing will take you on a journey that will allow you to ponder the wonders of life. Challenge you to reflect on what you believe, your purpose in life and what your dreams are telling you. We are all unique and our experiences shape the path in life we choose to take. We all have choices, the question is, how to those choices shape your life? Do you have an open mind? Do you experience everyday as if it is your first, or youâ€™re last? Do pre-conceived notions prevent you from growing in your daily life? These thought provoking reflections make us wonder about the worlds of magic, and clairvoyance, show us reality and the universe in a light you never imagined possible.They teach of the powerful meaning of friendship and love, they teach use to learn lessons from the smallest encounters, and not to discount any experience as invaluable. Every day experiences produce timeless lessons.
author: Leonard Belmont
